messages.title: Donâ€™t trust Theresa
messages.content: Theresa May... claimed to be on the side of ordinary working people... Yet she's the Home Secretary who presided over the immigration disaster... broke the promise to reduce net migration.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure the UK takes back control of its laws, borders, money, and trade.

issues.brexitEurope: Ensure the UK takes back control of its laws, borders, money, and trade.
issues.immigration: The Home Secretary who presided over the immigration disaster... broke the promise to reduce net migration.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Voter, I lead the only party in Broxtowe who will stand up to the political elite... I have also successfully completed my law degree... I have first hand experience of our failing immigration and asylum system.
